items.description: Empty Slot

items.name: Air Gem
items.description: A pale coloured gem brimming with air magic.

items.name: Alchemist's Scroll
items.description: Contains scribblings about turning lead to gold or some such nonsense.

items.name: Ancient Coin
items.description: Currency from an ancient civilisation, this belongs in a museum!

items.name: Ancient Scroll
items.description: An ancient scroll full of incantations long thought lost.

items.name: Ancient Spellbook
items.description: A tome from a time forgotten, filled with all sorts of incantations.

items.name: Aqua Rod
items.description: Command water magic with this beautiful wand.

items.name: Beast Necklace
items.description: Made from the fang of a felled beast, this necklace is distinctive.

items.name: Black Pearl
items.description: A dark pearl which shimmers in the light.

items.name: Black Potion
items.description: It says it can heal, but looks a bit suspicious. Medium Size.

items.name: Blackberry Bonbon
items.description: Ideal for those with a sweet tooth! This one tastes of blackberries.

items.name: Blank Scroll
items.description: Spare parchment, awaiting someone to use it for a spell.

items.name: Blaze Arrow
items.description: A more powerful arrow than the Fire Arrow. Sure to burn your target to ash.

items.name: Blood Blade
items.description: This sword gets its colour from those that fall victim to its blade.

items.name: Blood Buckler
items.description: The more foes this shield's owner slays, the strong it becomes.

items.name: Bloodstone Ring
items.description: The bloodstone set in this ring grants the wearer healing magic.

items.name: Blue Candycane
items.description: A sugary treat laced with blueberry flavour.

items.name: Blue Fish
items.description: Common in the local rivers, this fish's scales shimmer in the sunlight.

items.name: Blue Pearl
items.description: The colour of this beautiful pearl reminds of the seas from whence it came.

items.name: Blue Potion
items.description: This concoction restores mana and gives a boost of water magic. Medium size.

items.name: Blueberry Bonbon
items.description: Ideal for those with a sweet tooth! This one tastes of blueberries.

items.name: Bronze Helmet
items.description: A sturdy helmet to protect its wearer in battle.

items.name: Bronze Ingot
items.description: A solid bronze bar. A blacksmith can use it for crafting.

items.name: Bronze Key
items.description: A bronze-coloured key. Probably fits a bronze-coloured lock.

items.name: Brown Fish
items.description: A very common fish found in most bodies of fresh water.

items.name: Dark Gem
items.description: Dark as the night sky, this gem glistens with evil magic.

items.name: Dark Sword
items.description: Forged for a demon king, this sword burns the souls of its enemies.

items.name: Demon Helm
items.description: A terrifying helmet forged from the skull of a mighty demon.

items.name: Demon Shield
items.description: A shield emblazoned with a demon's skull. Horrific, yet practical.

items.name: Earth Gem
items.description: This brown coloured gem contains an abundance of earth magic.

items.name: Earthen Staff
items.description: The staff from an Earth Wizard. Gives the user control of earth magic.

items.name: Elven Ring
items.description: Forged by the forest elves, this ring grants the wearer extra stealth.

items.name: Empty Bottle
items.description: A glass bottle used to store potions. This is the size for a medium potion.

items.name: Empty Flask
items.description: A glass bottle used to store potions. This is the size for a large potion.

items.name: Empty Vial
items.description: A glass bottle used to store potions. This is the size for a small potion.

items.name: Festive Bonbon
items.description: Ideal for those with a sweet tooth! This one tastes of spices.

items.name: Festive Candycane
items.description: A sugary treat laced with a spicy flavour.

items.name: Fire Gem
items.description: It feels warm to the touch. This gem appears to have a tiny flame in its centre.

items.name: Fire Helm
items.description: Imbued with fire magic, this helmet can withstand any heat.

items.name: Fire Ring
items.description: Forged in the fires of a volcano, this ring allows the wearer to walk on lava.

items.name: Fire Staff
items.description: Control fire magic with this mighty staff.

items.name: Fire Arrow
items.description: This flaming arrow will burn tragets on contact. Aim with care!

items.name: Flame Bow
items.description: A magical bow that boosts the power of fire and blaze arrows.

items.name: Forest Arrow
items.description: An upgrade to its wooden cousin, this arrow has a hint of Elven magic.

items.name: Forest Shield
items.description: A fine shield crafted from the wood of an ancient tree.

items.name: Frost Arrow
items.description: Full of the strongest ice magic, this arrow will freeze whatever it touches. Handle with care.

items.name: Frozen Helmet
items.description: A sturdy helmet full of ice magic, this protects the wearer from extreme cold.

items.name: Gold Ingot
items.description: A solid bar of gold. Can be sold for a fortune or used in crafting.

items.name: Golden Arrow
items.description: Looks very flashy, but not that much better than a wooden one.

items.name: Golden Bow
items.description: Made of the finest gold, this bow is the definition of style over substance.

items.name: Golden Buckler
items.description: A golden shield designed to look good rather than protect people.

items.name: Golden Coin
items.description: A shiny gold coin used to make purchases in towns around the realm.

items.name: Golden Key
items.description: A key as lovely as this must open the way to an equally lovely prize!

items.name: Green Candycane
items.description: A sugary treat laced with a minty flavour.

items.name: Green Fish
items.description: A tricky fish to catch due to its ability to hide among the reeds.

items.name: Green Pearl
items.description: An unusual pearl with the colour of a vast meadow.

items.name: Green Potion
items.description: This potion was created to restore mana. Medium size.

items.name: Hero's Sword
items.description: A mighty sword favoured by heroes the world over.

items.name: Holy Arrow
items.description: An arrow blessed by the gods. Highly effective against demons.

items.name: Holy Blade
items.description: A blade said to be fuelled by the power of the gods. The bane of all evil.

items.name: Holy Shield
items.description: A strong shield that also provides brief immunity from evil magic.

items.name: Holy Spellbook
items.description: A thick tome filled with spells practiced by light mages across the realm.

items.name: Holy Staff
items.description: This staff gives control over powerful holy and healing magic.

items.name: Ice Arrow
items.description: Less powerful than the Frost Arrow but can still cool targets.

items.name: Ice Bow
items.description: A fine bow imbued with ice magic. Best paired with ice or frost arrows.

items.name: Ice Gem
items.description: A cold gem with a blue hue. Used to boost one's ice magic.

items.name: Knight's Helm
items.description: A sturdy helmet favoured by the nation's knights.

items.name: Large Black Potion
items.description: It says it can heal, but looks a bit suspicious. Large Size.

items.name: Large Blue Potion
items.description: This concoction restores mana and gives a boost of water magic. Large size.

items.name: Large Green Potion
items.description: This potion was created to restore mana. Large size.

items.name: Large Orange Potion
items.description: This potion restores mana and gives a boost of fire magic. Large size.

items.name: Large Pink Potion
items.description: A health restoring potion. Less potent than a red potion. Large size.

items.name: Large Purple Potion
items.description: This concoction restores both health and mana. Large size.

items.name: Large Red Potion
items.description: A vibrant red potion designed to restore health. Large size.

items.name: Lemon Bonbon
items.description: Ideal for those with a sweet tooth! This one tastes of lemon.

items.name: Light Arrow
items.description: A less potent version of the holy arrow. Effective against dark magic.

items.name: Light Ring
items.description: The stone in this ring emits a soft glow that can be used as a light source.

items.name: Light Shield
items.description: A small shield designed for maneuverability over defence.

items.name: Lime Bonbon
items.description: Ideal for those with a sweet tooth! This one tastes of lime.

items.name: Moon Ring
items.description: A moonstone ring that offers weak protection against magic attacks.

items.name: Mysterious Key
items.description: What does this unlock? Better start trying it out!

items.name: Orange Bonbon
items.description: Ideal for those with a sweet tooth! This one tastes of orange.

items.name: Orange Candycane
items.description: A sugary treat laced with an orange flavour.

items.name: Orange Potion
items.description: This potion restores mana and gives a boost of fire magic. Medium size.

items.name: Pile of Gold
items.description: Retrieved from a group of bandits. See that it gets returned to its owner!

items.name: Pile of Silver
items.description: A large pile of silver coins, can be used to purchase goods from merchants.

items.name: Pink Candycane
items.description: A sugary treat laced with a raspberry flavour.

items.name: Pink Potion
items.description: A health restoring potion. Less potent than a red potion. Medium size.

items.name: Poison Gem
items.description: Don't let its beautiful colour fool you, this gem contains strong poison magic.

items.name: Prized Necklace
items.description: An old friend gave you this a long time ago. Keep it safe.

items.name: Purple Candycane
items.description: A sugary treat laced with a blackcurrant flavour.

items.name: Purple Potion
items.description: This concoction restores both health and mana. Medium size.

items.name: Raspberry Bonbon
items.description: Ideal for those with a sweet tooth! This one tastes of raspberries.

items.name: Red Candycane
items.description: A sugary treat laced with a strawberry flavour.

items.name: Red Fish
items.description: This fish feeds on red algae, which gives it its unique colouring.

items.name: Red Pearl
items.description: An unusual pearl with a glimmering red colour.

items.name: Red Potion
items.description: A vibrant red potion designed to restore health. Medium size.

items.name: Royal Scepter
items.description: A magic scepter handed down through the royal family for generations.

items.name: Royal Scroll
items.description: This ancient scroll is an heirloom of the royal family.

items.name: Rusted Ingot
items.description: Rusted beyond recognition. A blacksmith can clean it up for you.

items.name: Rusty Key
items.description: A very rusty old key. It'll be a miracle if it still unlocks anything.

items.name: Shimmering Ingot
items.description: This metal has been polished to an high shine. Take it to a blacksmith.

items.name: Silver Arrow
items.description: Effective against werewolves thanks to its silver arrowhead.

items.name: Silver Bow
items.description: A finely crafted bow inlaid with silver. Said to boost the power of silver arrows.

items.name: Silver Coin
items.description: A shiny silver coin. Save up plenty of these for a shopping trip!

items.name: Silver Helm
items.description: A beautiful helmet mainly used for ceremonies. It's not really made for battle.

items.name: Silver Ingot
items.description: A solid bar of silver. Take this to a blacksmith to use it.

items.name: Silver Key
items.description: A small, silver key. A delicate key like this probably fits an equally delicate lock.

items.name: Silver Ring
items.description: A decorative silver ring. Contains a small amount of air magic.

items.name: Small Black Potion
items.description: It says it can heal, but looks a bit suspicious. Small Size.

items.name: Small Blue Potion
items.description: This concoction restores mana and gives a boost of water magic. Small size.

items.name: Small Gift
items.description: A small box with a gift inside. Who's this for?

items.name: Small Green Potion
items.description: This potion was created to restore mana. Small size.

items.name: Small Orange Potion
items.description: This potion restores mana and gives a boost of fire magic. Small size.

items.name: Small Pink Potion
items.description: A health restoring potion. Less potent than a red potion. Small size.

items.name: Small Purple Potion
items.description: This concoction restores both health and mana. Small size.

items.name: Small Red Potion
items.description: A vibrant red potion designed to restore health. Small size.

items.name: Spent Gem
items.description: This gem has been drained of all its magic. A mage can restore it.

items.name: Strawberry Bonbon
items.description: Ideal for those with a sweet tooth! This one tastes of strawberries.

items.name: Sun Ring
items.description: This special ring grants the wearer a defence boost during the day.

items.name: Thunder Gem
items.description: A gem full of thunder magic. Has a storm raging in its centre.

items.name: Thunder Staff
items.description: This staff allows the user to control violent storms using thunder magic.

items.name: Training Sword
items.description: A small wooden sword used to train new soldiers.

items.name: White Fish
items.description: A large fish which is highly sought after due to its delicious flavour.

items.name: Winter Shield
items.description: Built by craftsmen in the most northern region, this shield repels all ice magic.

items.name: Wizard's Scroll
items.description: A scroll containing basic teachings. Given to all new mages at a certain school.

items.name: Wooden Shield
items.description: A basic wooden shield used by newly recruited soldiers in their training.

items.name: Wooden Sword
items.description: An upgrade from the training sword. Made of wood but still sharp!

items.name: Woodland Arrow
items.description: A staple for any archer. This simple arrow is enough to get started.

items.name: Woodland Bow
items.description: A bow forged from ancient trees in the elven forest.

items.name: Worn Scroll
items.description: You can feel the magic emanating from this scroll. But it's too faded to read.

items.name: Yellow Fish
items.description: A small fish with yellow scales that glisten in the sunlight.
